attributes.action: Withdraw the honorary knighthood offered to Ted Kennedy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This man gave moral support to terrorists with his opinions on Nor-Aid and the activities of the IRA. Meanwhile good and decent people were murdered and maimed by those terrorists throughout the UK
No matter what your views on the validity of the argument, or the cause for a united Ireland, putting bombs on a bus or in a shopping centre is beyond the pale. To now ‘honour’ a man that supported these terrorist activities is an insult to those that died or were hurt,and to those that worked so hard to broker the current peace.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
